subject: Need to fetch the result data after each test run to update into resultDB (SQL)
msgSnippet: Hi, Can somebody help me, how to get the result as values like PASS, FAIL or ERROR if fail/error the call stack for each testcase. I need to get all the above
messageBody:
Hi,

Can somebody help me, how to get the result as values like PASS, FAIL or ERROR if fail/error the call stack for each testcase.

I need to get all the above mentioned values thru any of the "junit.framework..*" methods and inside the tearDown() method after each individual testcase run.


Kind regards,
Gajendran

eg:
class TestCaseBase extends TestCase {

private boolean pass;
private boolean fail;
private boolean error;
private boolean knownDefect;
private String testCaseName;
private Enumeration<TestFailure> description;
private TestResult result = new TestResult();



public TestCaseBase(String name) {
super(name);

}

public void setUp() {
System.out.println("\nENTERING into TestCase [" + this.getName() +"]");
//Do somthing


}



public void tearDown() {

System.out.println("\nEXITING TestCase [" + this.getName() +"]");


if (result.errors() != null) {
error = true;
this.description = result.errors();
}
if (result.failures() != null) {
error = true;
this.description = result.errors();
}
if (result.wasSuccessful()) {
pass = true;
} else {
fail = true;
}

// post result to DB after each test run
}
}


// TestCase class
class MyTestBase extends TestCaseBase {

public void testStartLogon() {
// Test1
}

public void test2() {
//Test 2
}

public void test3() {
//Test 3

}

}

Is there a way to get the TestResult for each testcase in the tearDown()

Please help me in this. I'm not aware which methods/classes to acheive this.But i know when the "The JUnit Runner UI" can get the result after each testcase run, we should be able to fetch from some way.


Thanks,
GAjendran Chandrappa
